headline: Jim Cramer Believes “Equinix is Still Too Expensive”
summary: Equinix, Inc. (NASDAQ:EQIX) is one of the stocks on Jim Cramer’s radar. A caller asked for Cramer’s thoughts on the company during the lightning round, and he stated: “Equinix is still too expensive. That’s the commodity side of this business. I don’t want you in the commodity side. If it came much lower, we would […]
